metadata.title: CVE-2024-45193 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Matrix libolm (aka Olm) through 3.2.16. There isEd25519 signature malleability due to lack of validation criteria (does notensure that S < n). NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products that areno longer supported by the maintainer.

criterions.comment: olm package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
